Receives secrets: GITHUB_TOKEN

div.div:
‚Üí Checkout caller's repository
‚Üí Setup Node.js and install dependencies (with --ignore-scripts for security)
‚Üí Run Dependency Review Action (with optional custom config)
‚Üí Run Renovate Bot (auto-discover and update dependencies)

div.div:
‚úÖ Security scan results posted as per the configuration file
‚úÖ Dependency update PRs created automatically
‚úÖ Security issues raised for vulnerabilities found
